column1: #text=Yesterday my car broke down , so I was thinking of how I would get to work .
#text=I decided one of the best options would be to take a public bus .
#text=Since I 've never taken one before , I went to the city website and looked at a schedule of all the bus times and routes .
#text=When I had finally decided on the bus that I needed to take , it was time to put my plan into action .
#text=I left my house and walked over to the bus stop .
#text=There were a few other people waiting there as well .
#text=When the bus arrived I got on and paid the driver the fee , which was $ 1 .
#text=I then sat down and waited for the bus to arrive at my destination .
#text=It took about 40 minutes to get where I was going , and I arrived safely .
#text=I think that overall it was a pleasant experience .
